title: Jaseci Code Runner
overviewMarkdown:
# Jaseci Code Runner

This plugin provides file operations for code files (supporting .py and .jac) via the code executor backend. It allows you to:

- **Read** a fileâ€™s source code
- **Execute** a file and return its output
- **Create** a new code file
- **Update** an existing file using a find/replace operation
- **Delete** a file (moving it to a .trash folder for eventual removal)

Use this plugin to manage code files directly from TypingMind, enabling seamless development workflows.

openaiSpec.name: JaseciCodeRunner

code.description: The code content for file creation (used with 'create' operation).

filename.description: The filename to operate on. Must end with '.py' or '.jac'.

findReplaceMessage.description: The find/replace message in the format s<delimiter>find<delimiter>replace<delimiter>flags (required for 'update' operation).

data.description: Any additional data returned (e.g., file contents, execution stdout/stderr, updated content).

message.description: A summary message indicating the result of the operation.

openaiSpec.description: Performs file operations on code files (supporting .py and .jac) via the /code/ endpoints. The operation parameter determines which action to perform: 'read' to get the file contents; 'execute' to run the file and capture its output; 'create' to create a new file; 'update' to apply a find/replace update; and 'delete' to move the file to trash.

userSettings.name: baseUrl
userSettings.label: Server URL
userSettings.description: The URL for the plugin server
